name: FantasyCards
description:
FantasyCards

This game was created as a submission for the OpenGameArt Late Fall Jam 2021

Created with Qt for Webassembly

Assets used:

  1. "Fossil Cave" by Écrivain licensed under CC0 
    modified by mesw licensed under CC0
  2. "Trading Card Template" by Avery Ross licensed CC-BY 4.0
    modified by mesw licensed under CC-BY 4.0
  3. "Fantasy UI Box" by StumpyStrust licensed CC-0
    unchanged
  4. "Floating Eyeball" by OwlishMedia licensed CC-0
    unchanged
  5. "Cuttle Fish portrait" by fmunoz.geo licensed CC0
    unchanged
  6. "Wizard" by Blarumyrran (blarumyrran@gmail.com) licensed CC-0
    flipped and added transparency by mesw licensed under CC-0.
  7. "Rose Flower (pyxeledit document and image)" by Lovecraft licensed CC-0
    unchanged

All assets are stored in, and loaded  from, the asset repository of this project: FantasyArts

The code repository for the game can be found here: FantasyCards
